content: To convert between degree and radian measures of angles, two methods are available, Math.toRadians(x) and Math.toDegrees(x).  While using Math.toRadians(x), a degrees value must be passed in, and that value in radians (the degree value multiplied by pi/180) will be returned.  The Math.toDegrees(x) method takes in a value in radians and the value in degrees (the radian value multiplied by 180/pi) is returned.
